activities: Consumer-related business data is received and processed by One Safe Place as follows: One Safe Place develops professional-grade on-premise and cloud-connected storage solutions for small and midsize businesses (SMBs) and remote office/branch office (ROBO) locations. As part of these services, One Safe Place stores data on behalf of its customers and business partners. It does not select or control the types of data that are submitted to its servers, and any access to, or use of, such data by One Safe Place is incidental to completing the contractual obligations of One Safe Place as data processor, to its customers. One Safe Place also is a data controller with respect to and uses personal data of its current and prospective customers and current and prospective partners for sales, billing, marketing, communicating with customers and partners about services and products, business partner recruitment purposes and updating our records and generally maintaining customer accounts and services. Human resources data is received and processed by One Safe Place as follows: One Safe Place is a data controller with respect to personal data for employee and non-employee personnel and service providers with respect to its divisions, business units and subsidiaries. No such personal data resides in, originates from, or relates to Switzerland. It collects, transfers, and uses personal data of its employees and non-employee personnel for human resources purposes, such as recruitment, hiring and engagement; managing and administering employment and engagement terms; compensation, benefits and statutory entitlements; performance management and discipline; administering and safeguarding workforces and operations; and compliance and corporate administration.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Personal Data Covered:  Organization HR data, and consumer-related data. No manually processed data.
